message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm open to negotiation.
Okay, let's be more realistic. How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  Time is money, and it's losing value fast.
I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I won't accept a 60/40 split. Let's meet in the middle.
Time is running out, and we're both losing with every round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
